conway_perf module¶

conway_perf.addGlider(i, j, grid)¶

adds a glider with top left cell at (i, j)

conway_perf.addGosperGliderGun(i, j, grid)¶

adds a Gosper Glider Gun with top left cell at (i, j)

conway_perf.main()¶
conway_perf.randomGrid(N)¶

returns a grid of NxN random values

conway_perf.update(grid, N)¶

Update the grid based on Conway’s rules
